ComicInfo.Summary:
Alopex is alone, her psyche reeling from Kitsune's mind control. With Raphael and Nobody searching for her, will Alopex be able to find her way back to the side of good?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Sophie Campbell | 1 | Sub | Artist's Edition Subscription Cover | Sophie Campbell | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 | RE | Comics & Ponies Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 4 | Note: The digital edition (1/18/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
